import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' function IssuesForm({ issue, postIssue, users, edit, projects, editIssue, issueId, setIssueId, errors }) { const initialState = { title: undefined, description: undefined, targetEndDate: undefined, project: undefined, assignedUsers: undefined, priority: "low", status: "open", type: "bugs/error", } const [state, setState] = useState(initialState) let myModalEl = document.getElementById('issueModal') useEffect(() => { if (edit && issue) { const d = new Date(issue.targetEndDate) const newDateString = `${d.getFullYear()}-${d.getMonth() + 1}-${d.getDay()}` console.log(newDateString) setState({ ...issue, targetEndDate: newDateString, project: issue.project._id, user: issue.createdBy._id }) } if (myModalEl) { myModalEl.addEventListener('hidden.bs.modal', function (event) { setState(initialState) setIssueId("") }) } }, [issue, setIssueId]) console.log(state) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() switch (e.target.name) { case "create": postIssue(state) break case "edit": editIssue(issueId, state) break default: return } } const projectOptions = projects.map((project, i) => { return }) const userOptions = users.map((user, i) => ( )) const handleChange = (e) => { setState({ ...state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } return (
{edit ? "Edit Issue" : "Create Issue"}
